Description.Name: I'll buy that for a dollar!
Description.Details: You're relaxing in the lounge, enjoying a nice glass of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGBL],Glengarry Black Label]] when you see Yang enter the lounge obviously searching for someone. His eyes lock onto you and he promptly heads your way. When he gets to your table, you look up smiling, "Looking for me?" "Yes Boss," Yang responds. You motion for him to sit, "Care for a glass?" Yang smiles as he sits down, "You bet your ass I do!" You signal the waitstaff to bring over a glass for Yang and then turn back to him, "So, you looked pretty focused on finding me, what's up? Something wrong in the MechBay?" Yang shakes his head, "Gods no, Boss. Running as smooth as fresh coolant. But, I have had some more responses to our enquiry about selling [[DEAD_MW,{DEAD_MW.Callsign}]]'s suit of Rogue Bear Battle Armour." You sit up straighter, more interested in the conversation now, "Do tell." Yang proceeds to relate the various offers and questions that have come in over the HPG network. Eventually he comes to main reason for seeking you out, "So Boss, there is a collector here in [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] that is very interested in Baracas and they are willing to pay a decent chunk of change for it." You take swig of your drink, "How much are they offering?" Yang shrugs and slides over a datapad, "They wouldn't say but they hinted at ¢1,500,000 which is way above any of the other offers we got. I have their details on this datapad and they have asked that you contact them personally to discuss. They also said this is a one time offer, so you need to act on it now."

Description.Name: The collector
Description.Details: You finish your drink, grab the datapad and buy another round for Yang, "Thanks for your hard work on this Yang. I'll get in touch with the Collector and get that suit of battle armour sold." You arrive back at your office and sit down at your desk. You connect the datapad to your comm terminal and open the call register for the only contact listed. You press the CONNECT button to initiate the call. After a few moments, the spinning CONNECTING message is replaced by a view of a very opulent lounge with floor to ceiling windows looking down on the cityscape of one of the larger metropolitan cites on [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]]. No audio appears to be transmitting, and you can see no one there. "Hello?" you ask. You hear some movement in the background before the view on the screen rotates to a figure hidden in the shadows. "Hello, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Thank you for getting back in touch with me." You stare at the screen thinking, rich people are weird before snapping out of it, "Uh, yeah, not a problem Mister..." The unknown figure you are talking to chuckles, "No need for my name Commander. I cannot afford any of my rivals to know where I obtain my collectibles from. I'm sure you can understand this. Now, lets just get right to it. As I told your associate, I am willing to buy Baracas, the custom Rogue Bear suit of the former Khan of Clan Star Adder, [[DEAD_MW,{DEAD_MW.Callsign}]], for the sum of ¢1,000,000 C-Bills." You start to laugh before catching yourself, "I beg your pardon sir, but the asking price is ¢1,500,000 C-Bills." The silence drags for what seems like an eternity before the figure responds, "¢1,100,000 C-Bills." The [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGBL],Glengarry Black Label]] you had earlier steels your resolve and you hold your ground, "This is a unique suit of battle armour. We have other interested parties. ¢1,500,000 C-Bills is our price." The figure doesn't hesitate and starts to lean forward, "Good luck with those other buyers, Commander. Good Bye." You quickly shout before they can terminate the call, "¢1,400,000 C-Bills. I have a Mercenary Company to run." The shadowy figure leans back in their seat, "¢1,250,000 C-Bills and this is my final offer Commander." Not wishing to lose out, you agree to the final sum and spend the next few hours signing digital paperwork to finalise the deal.

Description.Name: Find a Hacker
Description.Details: Search out Black Market Star Systems

Description.Name: Black Market
Description.Details: You stare at the datapad before ultimately shaking your head, "You know what Yang? Thanks for your efforts, but I'm really leaning towards keeping that suit of battle armour. Can you hook us up with one of those hacker types you mentioned before?" Yang retrieves the datapad, "Sure thing Boss. I'll let you know if any of them get in touch with us." You order another round of drinks for you both, "Thanks Yang." Spend time in Star Systems that have BLACK MARKET tags to see if you are approached by a Representative

Description.Name: Scrapyard
Description.Details: You stare at the datapad before ultimately shaking your head, "You know what Yang? Thanks for your efforts, but the more I dwell on this the more I'd just rather scrap the suit of Rogue Bear Battle Armour and be done with it. Let's have another round and you can organise scrapping that suit of battle armour tomorrow." Yang smiles, "You got it Boss." EVENT COMPLETED: STORE OR SCRAP BARACAS ROGUE BEAR BATTLE ARMOUR AS YOU SEE FIT
